(f)    Mbao. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W32    Mr Bwalya (Lupososhi) - to ask the Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health:
(a)    how many Government skills training centres there were country-wide as of 31st March, 2012, province by province; and

(b)    whether the Government has plans to construct a skills training centre in Lupososhi Parliamentary Constituency and, if so, when the construction will commence. W33    Mr Mufalali (Senanga) - to ask the Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education:
(a)    what the cut-off points for entry into grades 8 and 10 were from 1991 to 2012, province by province;
(b)    if the cut-off points varied, what the basis for the variation was; and

(c)    how many secondary schools had fully fledged laboratories in the period above, province by province.
